name: Space Forest Dilemma
description:
Test your logic, planning and timing skills in this fast paced and challenging arcade puzzler, where the objective is simple: Don't collide!


"A real delight for fans of logic puzzles" - 148apps, 4/5

"Tough as nails, but never unfair" - AndroidRundown, 8/10

"A simple puzzle game with a brilliant premise" - Gamezebo

"Sharp controls and devious puzzles" - AppSpy

"A beautiful new arcade puzzler" - SuperGameDroid

"So far, so weird" - GoPlayThat

“Fabulous game!”
“Very addictive!”
“I can’t stop playing!” - User Comments




GAMEPLAY

To master a level you have make all the blocks move without colliding. Each type of block has a unique movement pattern and each obstacle will try to stop you in different ways. You need to learn the patterns, then plan, time & execute each move perfectly in order not to collide. Challenge yourself further by squeezing the time on each level to achieve the lowest total time.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Unique & challenging one touch gameplay - Straightforward, Minimalistic, Stimulating
* A whole bunch of handcrafted levels - New types of blocks and obstacles introduced as you proceed
* Semi-epic story line - Follow Chris Crossfire in a text based space adventure unfolding as you complete level by level
* Pretty awesome soundtrack - Yep...


THE STORY

Caught up in middle of the struggle between the greedy Spinner Corporation and the mystical Space Forest Preservation Initiative, Chris Crossfire is forced to choose sides. Keep harvesting those Octagon Trees like it ain’t no thang, or listen to his conscience and join the tree huggers. All he really wants to do is fly spaceships and kick back with an occasional burger. Chris Crossfire has a dilemma. A Space Forest Dilemma.


PREMIUM

Space Forest Dilemma is playable at no cost and free from ads. An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will enable 60 more levels, new blocks & obstacles, new game mode, bonus track and more....


PRIVACY POLICY

In order to make your game experience better this game asks for certain privileges like Internet access and to save your progress. We make games for our buddies and treat them and you with respect when it comes to integrity and personal information.


CONTACT

Please send any questions or feedback to info@papaquark.com. We appreciate all feedback and will consider any suggestions to improve the game.

Thank you for the confidence. We hope you enjoy the game!
